about_the_game:
Enjoy the simulation of authentic combat fighters from 1940


This DLC grants you access to Tier 0 (pre-1940) fighters:
  • German Messerschmitt BF 109-E1
  • German Messerschmitt BF 110-C
  • British Hurricane Mk I
  • British Spitfire Mk Ia
  • French Hawk 75
  • French Dewotine 520
Upon purchase, these vehicles will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the airfield you have selected.

downloadable content may be purchased without requiring a subscription! You will pay for a DLC one time and you will own that content indefinitely.
At anytime, you can subscribe to gain full access but should you choose to unsubscribe, these DLC items will remain with your account, always.

The units included in this paratrooper pack DLC are also available with the PREMIUM Subscription.

Controls

ATTENTION: Flying in WWII Online is most optimal with a joystick. We highly encourage the purchase of a joystick prior to or shortly after purchasing this pack.
detailed_description:
Enjoy the simulation of authentic combat fighters from 1940


This DLC grants you access to Tier 0 (pre-1940) fighters:
  • German Messerschmitt BF 109-E1
  • German Messerschmitt BF 110-C
  • British Hurricane Mk I
  • British Spitfire Mk Ia
  • French Hawk 75
  • French Dewotine 520
Upon purchase, these vehicles will be immediately available for you to access, providing supply is available at the airfield you have selected.

downloadable content may be purchased without requiring a subscription! You will pay for a DLC one time and you will own that content indefinitely.
At anytime, you can subscribe to gain full access but should you choose to unsubscribe, these DLC items will remain with your account, always.

The units included in this paratrooper pack DLC are also available with the PREMIUM Subscription.

Controls

ATTENTION: Flying in WWII Online is most optimal with a joystick. We highly encourage the purchase of a joystick prior to or shortly after purchasing this pack.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 +
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: mac OS High Sierra 10.13.6
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better

name: Combat Fighter Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 / Windows 8
  • Processor: Pentium 4 3.2 GHz or Athlon 64 3500+ (2.2 GHz) or better with SSE 2.0 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 series or ATI Radeon HD 2600 Pro
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: on-board or better
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 / Windows 10
  • Processor: 3 GHz Dual Core or 2.66 GHz Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 250 or Radeon HD 4850 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Calling all fighter aces! Join the air war with this Combat Fighter pack and fly six - single seater planes. Hop into the legendary aircraft that played an instrumental part in the air war over Europe.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
